column4: F0LL0W3R: the problem is though that you need to have an account on your machine to access the shares. This preference can be set in the samba configuration file
<dsas> how can i make such like these accounts ?
To remove the need for accounts you need to look for security=share, and change it to security=user. You could also just add new accounts in system->admin->users and groups I think.
aha thx i will try now
